greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Product of the even divisors of n.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: If n is odd or an even squarefree number, then a(n) = floor((2*n)^(1 - ceiling(n/2) + floor(n/2)) * (d(n)/4)). (End)
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(d=divisors(n)); prod(k=1, #d, if (!(d[k]%2), d[k], 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 08 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 14 2008
